alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 26 at 7:25AM CST until November 28 at 4:54AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt, Rockwall and Kaufman Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
